name: ACS
tagline: An Office Solutions Company in Northamptonshire.
description: ACS has been providing complete office solutions for 21 years. Established in 1995, the group now provides services in four specialist areas; IT solutions, Furniture & Interiors, Cloud solutions, and Recruitment. The ACS group aims to provide solutions that will help you save money, increase productivity and reduce the level of risk against your business. The four divisions within the group work together or independently to provide full business solutions.
